definition[0]: the second letter of the English alphabet
definition[1]: the seventh note in the musical scale of C major or the musical key based on this note
definition[2]: a mark given to a student’s work to show that it is good but not excellent
example[0]: I got a B in history.
definition[3]: used to refer in a short way to one of two different things or people. You can call the first one A
example[1]: the advantages and disadvantages of choosing product A or B
